appDesc.message: Control your music from any app! Integrates with Windows and Linux operating systems.

appDetected.message: App detected tab with 'Yandex Music', but can't connect to the tab!

appQuestion.message: The app needs to reload the tab or open a new one.

showNotify.message: Show notifications when control from keyboard:

increaseCover.message: Reduce the control buttons and increase the cover.

addedToBlackList.message: The track will no longer appear in your recommendations!

removeFromBlackList.message: Now the track can appear in your recommendations!

noShortcutKeyAction.message: There is no shortcut key set for this action! Don't forget to set in keyboard shortcuts. Also, after assigning the shortcut keys, you may need to restart the browser for them to work correctly.

isNoKeyAction.message: There is no shortcut key set for this action!

checkBoxSavePos.message: Save the position and size of the popup.

shortcutKeyOpenPopup.message: Select a shortcut key to open and activate the popup. (The default shortcut key will be reassigned).

checkBoxReassignFirstHalf.message: Now the shortcut key which uses as '

checkBoxReassignSecondHalf.message: ' will be used for open popup.

allNotifications.message: Notification every time a track is switched.
